scriptsComments.watch:sync-bundle: refresh browser when project files are changed
scriptsComments.watch:sync-server: refresh server when server files are changed
scriptsComments.watch:test: test when src/test files are changed
scriptsComments.watch:js: build the project with dev env settings
scriptsComments.test: Run all tests. Returns a non-zero exit code if any test fails

dependenciesComments.body-parser: parse incoming request bodies, available under the req.body property
dependenciesComments.compression: compress data before sending it to the client
dependenciesComments.cookie-parser: parse cookies sent in requests, not used to my knowledge
dependenciesComments.google-palette: generate colors for the 3d visualization, could remove this if we had hard coded colors or removed the 3d visualization
dependenciesComments.ini: parse ini files.  could remove this if we used json files for db data
dependenciesComments.livereload: auto reload browser afer dev builds
dependenciesComments.lodash.frompairs: convert array of two-length arrays to a object
dependenciesComments.lodash.get: get a specific key from object
dependenciesComments.lodash.debounce: prevent a function from running too many times in a very small timeframe
dependenciesComments.lodash.difference: general difference function for objects, lists, etc
dependenciesComments.lodash.intersection: general intersection function for objects, lists, etc
dependenciesComments.lodash.isempty: general check for is empty, could be removed as we only use it a few times and can replace it with .length === 0
dependenciesComments.lodash.union: general union function for objects, lists, etc
dependenciesComments.mysql2: mysql node driver which returns promises
dependenciesComments.query-string: format request params in the body
dependenciesComments.three: 3d visualization, could be removed if 3d visualization feature is removed
dependenciesComments.v-tooltip: tooltip for the 3d visualization, could be removed if 3d visualization feature is removed
dependenciesComments.vue: ui for 3d visualization, could be removed if 3d visualization feature is removed
dependenciesComments.vue-draggable-resizable: ^2.0.0-rc2, makes the 3d visualization ui resizable and draggable

devDependenciesComments.autoprefixer: automatically add browser-specific prefixes to new css tags
devDependenciesComments.babel-loader: webpack plugin to process es6 files and transform it into es5 js
devDependenciesComments.chai: testing framework used in test-populate-database, these should use jest instead
devDependenciesComments.clean-webpack-plugin: used in build process to clean the dist directory before writing output bundles to the dist directory
devDependenciesComments.cross-env: sets environment variables for windows/linux/mac, only used in the build-prod command
devDependenciesComments.extra-watch-webpack-plugin: part of the build process to watch for changes in non-js code e.g. css or html files
devDependenciesComments.forever: server startup/management.  might not be needed if we use pm2
devDependenciesComments.fs-extra: used in the webpack build script
devDependenciesComments.html-webpack-plugin: generates hashable bundle names and injects it into html dynamically e.g. main-8439427.js -> create script tag in html referencing main-8439427.js
devDependenciesComments.mocha: testing framework. used in test-populate-database, these should use jest instead
devDependenciesComments.npm-run-all: utility used in package.json scripts to run multiple scripts sequentially
devDependenciesComments.post-compile-webpack-plugin: builds sass files after the js build is finished to keep both in sync
